title: Context Bundler Manifest
description: Schema for defining a bundle of files for context generation.

title.description: Title of the generated context document.

description.description: Optional description included at the top of the bundle.

files.description: List of files to include in the bundle. IMPORTANT: The first file MUST be the prompt/instruction file.

path.description: Relative path to the file to include.

note.description: Optional note or annotation about this file.
